mapper.insert: INSERT INTO mv_sr(mvno, mno, titl, time, phot, cont, spo, cdt) VALUES(#{mvno}, #{mno}, #{title}, #{time}, #{photo}, #{cont}, #{spo}, now())
INSERT INTO mv_sr_cmt(srno, mno, phot, cont, cdt) VALUES (#{srno}, #{mno}, #{photo}, #{cont}, now())
INSERT INTO mv_sr_map(cmno, mp_nm, lat, lng) VALUES (#{cmno}, #{mapName}, #{lat}, #{lng})
mapper.select: SELECT srno FROM mv_sr WHERE mvno = #{value} ORDER BY time ASC LIMIT 1
SELECT srno, mvno, mno, titl, time, phot, cont, spo FROM mv_sr WHERE mvno = #{mvno} ORDER BY time ASC

SELECT cmt.cmno, sr.mvno, cmt.srno, mb.mno, cmt.phot, cmt.cont, cmt.cdt, cmt.mdt , mpno, mp_nm, lat, lng, nick, p_phot, mid FROM mv_sr_cmt cmt LEFT JOIN mv_sr_map mp ON cmt.cmno = mp.cmno INNER JOIN mv_memb mb ON cmt.mno = mb.mno INNER JOIN mv_sr sr ON cmt.srno = sr.srno WHERE upper(cmt.cont) like upper(concat('%#%',#{keyword},'%')) ORDER BY cdt DESC

SELECT cmt.cmno, srno, mb.mno, phot, cont, cdt, mdt , mpno, mp_nm, lat, lng, nick, p_phot FROM mv_sr_cmt cmt LEFT JOIN mv_sr_map mp ON cmt.cmno = mp.cmno INNER JOIN mv_memb mb ON cmt.mno = mb.mno WHERE cmt.srno = #{srno} ORDER BY cdt DESC
LIMIT #{paging.startRowNo} , #{paging.pageSize}
SELECT srno, mvno, titl, time, phot, count(pstno)as cnt FROM mv_like ml,mv_sr ms WHERE ml.pstno=ms.srno AND ml.type = 'sr' GROUP BY pstno HAVING count(pstno)>0 ORDER by cnt DESC LIMIT 8

SELECT srno, mvno, titl, time, phot, cdt, count(pstno)as cnt FROM mv_like ml,mv_sr ms WHERE ml.pstno=ms.srno AND ml.type = 'sr' AND DATE_FORMAT(ms.cdt, '%Y-%m-%d') <= #{value} AND DATE_FORMAT(ms.cdt, '%Y-%m-%d') > DATE_ADD( STR_TO_DATE(#{value}, '%Y-%m-%d'), INTERVAL -3 day) GROUP BY pstno HAVING count(pstno)>0 ORDER by cnt DESC LIMIT 8

SELECT t2.mno , mb.nick as nickname , mb.p_phot as profileImage FROM (SELECT t1.mno , sum(t1.pnt) as sum FROM ((SELECT mno, count(srno)*10 as pnt FROM mv_sr sr WHERE mvno = #{mvno} AND mno != 21 GROUP BY mno) UNION ALL (SELECT mno, count(cmno)*2 as pnt FROM mv_sr_cmt cmt WHERE srno IN (SELECT srno FROM mv_sr WHERE mvno = #{mvno}) AND mno != 21 GROUP BY mno) ) t1 GROUP BY t1.mno ) t2 INNER JOIN mv_memb mb ON t2.mno = mb.mno ORDER BY t2.sum desc LIMIT 3
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM mv_sr_map WHERE cmno in (SELECT cmno FROM mv_sr_cmt WHERE srno = #{value})
mapper.update: UPDATE IGNORE mv_sr_cmt SET mno=21 WHERE mno=#{mno}
